alert.note: Alert for Eastern Tucker (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 10 at 1:39AM EST until December 10 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Eastern Tucker County. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. A patchy glaze of ice is possible. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
